inclusion.criterion: complete two one-page questionnaires (uploaded in research navigator)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: baseline demographic information and medical information will be obtained from the patient and chart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: information regarding medications, laboratory data, and procedural data will be obtained from the medical chart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: data regarding the severity of CAD will be recorded at the conclusion of the coronary angiography procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: do not consent or are unable to give consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He underwent Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis, L>R. Angiography revealed an 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis.
